    • Field Detail

      • DW

        public static final UpdateDatatype.Option<Quorum> DW
        Durable Write Quorum. How many replicas to commit to durable storage before returning a successful response.

      • N_VAL

        public static final UpdateDatatype.Option<Integer> N_VAL

      • PW

        public static final UpdateDatatype.Option<Quorum> PW
        Primary Write Quorum. How many primary nodes must be up when the write is attempted.

      • RETURN_BODY

        public static final UpdateDatatype.Option<Boolean> RETURN_BODY
        Return Body. Return the object stored in Riak. Note this will return all siblings.

      • SLOPPY_QUORUM

        public static final UpdateDatatype.Option<Boolean> SLOPPY_QUORUM

      • TIMEOUT

        public static final UpdateDatatype.Option<Integer> TIMEOUT
        Timeout. Sets the server-side timeout for this operation. The default in Riak is 60 seconds.

      • W

        public static final UpdateDatatype.Option<Quorum> W
        Write Quorum. How many replicas to write to before returning a successful response.
